entry.title: WIND WARNING , Fort Qu'Appelle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:45 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 8:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: NNW 56 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow or rain. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain early this evening then 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind northwest 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 then to 30 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:42 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:42 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:42 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
